alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 1:25PM AKDT until May 31 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Stevens Village. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying area is occurring. Some roads, homes and structures are still inundated with water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - As of noon Tuesday, water levels on the Yukon River near Stevens Village crested on Friday and have since slowly receded by about 1.5 feet. Upstream river levels are steadily dropping and will continue to recede at Stevens Village, though residual high water in the village is still inundating some roads and structures. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood If you live near or along the Yukon River at Stevens Village stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
